name: Keyhole Spy: Fantasy Passion
description:
For thousands of years, people have lived side by side with magical creatures but only few have managed to meet with them. Where they live? What powers they have? And most importantly - how magician girls from another world differ from Earth girls?

In this game we will open the mysterious curtain and show you how they really look. Going forward, these magical beauties will pleasantly surprise you!
But nothing's a given: if you want to see sexual girls from another world you have to win in the magic game. The more points you score, the better you can see the charming creater! When an image of a girl becomes as detailed as possible, you can do something else with her... This is not quite what you’ve just thought, but it will also bring a lot of pleasure.

Keyhole Spy: Fantasy Passion - a game full of secrets where you will play with beauties with magical powers! The further you pass the game, the hotter the beauties become.

  • Sensual magician girls in revealing clothing
  • Mini-game with magic items

Plunge into the magical world and meet enchanting magician who live there. Collect magic items three in a row and see how your wildest and most unusual dreams are coming to life!
